alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 10
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 10 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots and lots of bug fixes

beta.title: Tweeten Beta 1.5.1
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Beta 1.5.1 for Tweeten!

You asked for it, and we are delivering! With the previous update, we introduced spell-check support. Today, we are adding suggestions for spell-check. If you spell something incorrectly, simply right click on the word and Tweeten will offer suggestions! Get Tweetin'

We are also introducing some improvements to the Welcome + Changelog screens. Additionally, with the latest update, we have moved Settings to the top bar. To toggle it, simply hit the Alt key, then click on Tweeten and click on Settings to customize the look of our app!

We have some exciting updates planned for the next few weeks! Oh, Mac and Linux users, we are coming to your dekstop soon. Promise.

Thanks for all the love in the recent weeks :) Make sure to let us know if you have any feedback about Tweeten via Twitter (We are @TweetenApp on Twitter) or Slack.
